name: The Super Cool Quest for the Ivy Grip
name_original: The Super Cool Quest for the Ivy Grip
description:
Having an operation can be pretty scary, but a little bit of time and care can help fix a mindset. Experience a fantasy roleplaying adventure, as seen through the eyes of a child in hospital. Roll the dice and see where it takes you! Additional notes: This game includes opportunities to roll a D20, and all images used come from photographs of whiteboard illustrations.

Created as part of Global Game Jam 2020

***

Narrative Designer & Artist: Jess Watson

Narrative Designer, Writer & Twine: Rebecca Kerr

Sound Designer: Xoe Baird

Full Credits available on game.
